# **The models**

## `freqs`

$$
\mathcal{L}(\mathbf{p}) = \prod_i \prod_\ell \left( \sum_{a=0}^{m_i}P(R_{i\ell}|G_{i\ell}=a)P(G_{i\ell}=a|p_\ell) \right).
$$

## `diseq`

$$
\mathcal{L}(\mathbf{p},\Phi) = \prod_i \prod_\ell \left( \sum_{a=0}^{m_i}P(R_{i\ell}|G_{i\ell}=a)P(G_{i\ell}=a|p_\ell,\phi_\ell) \right).
$$
